InitialIssueTree.Title: Academic Life
InitialIssueTree.Description: When you're having trouble dealing with courses, professors, and more.

Children.Title: Course Work
Children.Description: For problems with course material, or general questions.

Children.Title: Scheduling
Children.Description: For questions about how scheduling works, or recommendations on what courses to choose.

Children.Title: Professors
Children.Description: When you're having issues with a professor or want to know more about them.

InitialIssueTree.Title: Campus Life
InitialIssueTree.Description: On campus housing, dining, transportation, and the like.

InitialIssueTree.Title: University Affairs

InitialIssueTree.Title: Something Else
InitialIssueTree.Description: When your problem doesn't fit anywhere else.
